# Clone a custom event or a custom scheduled event

Learn how to clone an existing custom event or custom scheduled event in the Zuora UI.

1.  Navigate to in the left navigation menu.
2.  Click the Custom Events tab.
3.  Click the more options icon ![More action icon](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/9d293d31-4491-421c-b4d6-f5a49e5f13c3?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..kvnYQCTq9GvRVKNBHHcEUJfKoenTmAlHQ1Pg92FlgUA) to the right of an event.
4.  Click Clone.
5.  Enter a different API Name for the cloned event.
6.  Optional: Update other fields based on your requirements.
7.  Click Clone.
